column3: yenyim dɛ hɛn nyina wowɔ nyimdzee: nyimdzee dze ahomemado ba

column2: "Sɛ obi susu dɛ onyim biribi a
column3: onnyae nnhunii dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ dɛ ohu;"

column2: "Na abosom afɔrbɔdze ne dzi ho dze
column4: yenyim dɛ ɔbosom nnyɛ hwee wɔ wiadze mu
column5: na eso nyame bi nnyi hɔ dɛ ɔbaako no ara."

column4: dza wɔfrɛ hɔn enyame pii wɔ hɔ
column5: dɛ enyame pii nye ewuranom pii wɔ hɔ no a
column9: Egya no a adze nyina fir no mu
column10: na hɛn so yɛwɔ hɔ ma no
column12: Jesus Kraest a adze nyina nam no do
column13: na hɛn so yɛnam no do no."

column2: "Naaso dɛm nyimdzee yi nnyi nyimpa nyina mu
column3: ma ntsi binom dze hɔn ntɔyɛɛ wɔ abosonsɛm ho no dzi no dɛ abosom afɔrbɔdze
column4: na dɛ hɔn tsibowa yɛ mberɛw ntsi

column3: na nnyɛ dɛ sɛ yedzi a na yɛhyɛ ma
ama no ho kwan a hom wɔ no aannyɛ fintsidua amma hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw no."

column2: "Na sɛ obi hu ɔwo a ewɔ nyimdzee dɛ etse edzidzii wɔ abosondan mu
column3: na sɛ ne tsibowa yɛ mberɛw a
column4: ana ennkɛma oenya ngyinado ekedzi abosom afɔrbɔdze a?"

column2: "Nna ɔnam wo nyimdzee do na onua a ɔyɛ mberɛw a Kraest wui maa no no reyew."
"Na sɛ hom yɛ enuanom no bɔn dɛm pirapira hɔn tsibowa a ɔyɛ mberɛw no a
column3: nna Kraest na hom reyɛ no bɔn."
sɛ nam ne dzi ma mo nua fintsiw a
